newsitem.title: GREECE: PUBLIC PETROLEUM (DEP) HIKES GASOLINE, DIESEL PRICES.
newsitem.headline: PUBLIC PETROLEUM (DEP) HIKES GASOLINE, DIESEL PRICES.

text.p: Greece's Public Petroleum Corporation (DEP) will raise gasoline and diesel prices by 1.1 and 1.0 drachmas per litre, effective on Thursday. Heating fuel prices will stay unchanged, it said.
The price adjustments come after higher international gasoline and diesel prices, up by $3.4 and $2.7 per metric tonne and a higher dollar drachma exchange rate, DEP said.
